text: Kamen Rider Stronger is a Japanese television series. It is the fifth entry in the Kamen Rider Series, the show was broadcast on TBS and MBS from April 5, 1975 to December 27, 1975. Stronger is a co-production between Ishimori Productions and Toei, and was created by Shōtarō Ishinomori. ==New things== It is the first Kamen Rider entry to introduce a form changing ability. It is used in Kamen Rider Black RX, and the future Kamen Rider TV series entries, such as Kamen Rider Kuuga onward. ==Cast== * Shigeru Jō/Kamen Rider Stronger: Shigeru Araki * Yuriko Misaki: Kyōko Okada * Tōbei Tachibana: Akiji Kobayashi * Yōichirō Masaki: Hiroshi Ogasawara * Titan: Akira Hamada * Dead Lion (voice): Mahito Tsujimura * The Great Leader of Black Satan, The Great Leader of Delza Army, Great Leader Rock (voice): Gorō Naya * General Shadow (voice): Hidekatsu Shibata * Marshal Machine (voice): Osamu Ichikawa * Narrator: Shinji Kanae ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Kamen Rider Stronger no Uta" ("The Song of Kamen Rider Stronger") ** Lyrics: Saburō Yatsude ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Ichirou Mizuki ; Insect theme * "Set Up! Kamen Rider X" ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Ichirou Mizuki ** Episodes: 36 ; Ending theme * "Kyō mo Tatakau Stronger" ("Stronger Fights Today") ** Lyrics: Saburō Yatsude ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artists: Masato Shimon & Mitsuko Horie (episodes 1 & 2), Ichirou Mizuki & Mitsuko Horie (episode 3-31) ** Episodes: 1-31 * "Stronger Action" ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artists: Ichirou Mizuki & Mitsuko Horie ** Episodes: 32-39 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:1975 television series debuts Category:1975 television series endings Category:1975 disestablishments in Asia Category:1970s Japanese television series debuts Category:1970s Japanese television series endings
title: Kamen Rider Stronger
